query.statement:
UPDATE SAPHEE.ZPST0138 SET NAME1 = #NAME1# ,TYPE = #TYPE# ,TELNO_O = #TELNO_O# ,FAX_O = #FAX_O# ,GUBUN = #GUBUN# ,ACTSS = #ACTSS# ,NAMEE = #NAMEE# ,TEMNO = #TEMNO# ,NAMET = #NAMET# ,POSIC = #POSIC# ,POSIT = #POSIT# ,POSIE = #POSIE# ,ADDRE = #ADDRE# ,CELLP = #CELLP# -- ,MAJOR = #MAJOR# ,DIRECT = #DIRECT# ,INDIRECT= #INDIRECT# ,CAREY = #CAREY# ,CAREM = #CAREM# ,INSU1 = #INSU1# ,INSU2 = #INSU2# ,INSU3 = #INSU3# ,INSU4 = #INSU4# --,ENTER = #ENTER# ,ENAME = #G_USER_ID# ,EDATE = HEX(CURRENT DATE) ,PICTU = #PICTU# -- ,INSUNO = #INSUNO# -- ,INSUNM = #INSUNM# ,PICINSU = #PICINSU# ,STATS = #STATS# -- ,ZTEAM = #ZTEAM#
,BIRTH = #BIRTH# ,PSPID = #PSPID# ,LOCALMAN = #LOCALMAN # ,FOREIGNER = #FOREIGNER# ,NATION = #NATION# ,DUTY = #DUTY# ,SFT_SHOE = #SFT_SHOE# ,SP_SUIT = #SP_SUIT# ,SP_SUIT2 = #SP_SUIT2# ,WT_SUIT = #WT_SUIT# ,WT_SUIT2 = #WT_SUIT2# ,VEST = #VEST# ,DUTY2 = #TYPE#
WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND LIFNR = #LIFNR# --AND REPLACE(saphee.decrypt(JUMIN),'-','') = #JUMIN# AND PERKEY = #PERKEY#
AND RETIF = '' AND STATS = 'A'
